result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nicholas Alan Soberri

records.addlTxt: Pretrial 12-2-22 at 10:10 am and Return date 12-13-22 at 9:00 am Br. 1
Attorney Mark Lawton appointed, with payment schedule
Return date on December 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 2, 2022 at 10:10 am.

10:38 AM Defendant Nicholas Alan Soberri in court. Court found the defendant indigent. Appointed Attorney Mark Lawton. Defendant is to pay $100.00 per month starting 12/1/22.  10:40 AM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 2, 2022 at 10:10 am.
Indigency hearing on October 31, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Filed by Defendant.
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: for a pretrial conference 10/14/22 at 11:30 A.M. and return date 12/13/22 at 9:00 A.M.
standard felony conditions, may travel out of the State of WI for employment only, not possess/consume controlled substances w/out valid prescription, not possess drug paraphernalia

11:16 AM Prosecuting attorney Margeret Anne Sorrentino in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nicholas Alan Soberri in court. waives reading of complaint, right to atty recited, $500.00 signature bond, standard felony conditions, may travel out of the State of WI for employment only, not possess/consume controlled substances w/out valid prescription, not possess drug paraphernalia, waives time limits to prelim,
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Return date scheduled for December 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.
